content.h3: If I'm proud of anything, it's that I have the audacity to dream big.
p: I’ve been the swedish champion in heavy weight boxing, I’ve been a comedian on live TV and I’ve been a writer in two highly ranked blogs.
With mulish stubborness, I'm now chasing my biggest dream: Becoming an Entrepreneur in Software Engineering.

sections.title: Xp
sections.ingress: At the end of the day, what you wan't to know is what can I do? Well, seek no further. Below follows my merits and capabalities.

p: Working as a freelancer on developing medical applications for the Microsoft Hololens in Unity and Visual Basic Studio.
Working as a freelancer on Qamcom.se (WIP).
Node Js, Angular, Jquery, HTML & CSS, Mongoose, ExpressJS, AWS
Developing a patented Content Management System for Static Sites

sections.title: Contact
sections.ingress: Ready to take a step further in our relationship? Come on, now, don't be shy - we're a happy bunch and we'd love to hear from you! Pick your favorite channel from below and see you soon.
